Headline: #90 Harlem Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Ave
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem: due to, street blockage near  North Blvd/Forest Ave.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running with significant delays in both directions.

At this time, our operations staff are working to run as much service as frequently and manage service to be spaced as evenly as possible.

Consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound  Blue Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
